## map package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [containsKey(map, key)](./map.containskey.md) | Determines whether a map contains a specified key. |
|  [containsValue(map, value)](./map.containsvalue.md) | Determines whether a map contains a specified value. |
|  [entries(map)](./map.entries.md) | Returns a two dimensional array of the entries of a map. |
|  [keys(map)](./map.keys.md) | Returns an array of the keys of a map. |
|  [max(map)](./map.max.md) | Returns the entry with the maximum value of a map. |
|  [min(map)](./map.min.md) | Returns the entry with the minimum value of a map. |
|  [values(map)](./map.values.md) | Returns an array of the values of a map. |
